title: First Basic Webpage
description: This project focuses on checking if the user can layout a basic HTML webpage.

steps.content: Layout a simple HTML document with DOCTYPE at the top.
Add a HTML tag that is used as the root tag of the webpage.
Add the HEAD and BODY tag inside the HTML tag you created.
Add a title to the HEAD tag and set its value to 'My First Website'.
Add a H1 tag inside the body and set the text to 'This is how a simple website is laid out'.

code: This is how a simple website is laid out.
